title: Bug on latest nightly: does not have a "def_span"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
The part of `ExchangeCommonTrait`: 
```
pub trait ExchangeCommonTrait<IntercomMain: Debug, IntercomSelf: Debug> {
    type LoopContext;
    type LoopEvent<'a>;
    ...
}
```
And backtrace:
```

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'DefId(20:34 ~ commonlib[e6dd]::traits::ExchangeCommonTrait::LoopEvent::'a) does not have a "def_span"', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder/cstore_impl.rs:205:1
```
